heading.emphasis:
Arcyria cinerea (Bull.) Pers.
(52 FC, 55 MC, 47 loc, 29 ps)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Loc. 2 Mahé : On dead wood and bark of
Swietenia macrophylla , AM
3043, TK2792. On rotten mossy wood of
Swietenia macrophylla , AM
3055, TK2807 (3FC). On fallen leaves of
Cheilocostus speciosus , SLS
32410 (MC pH 7). Loc. 5 Mahé : On roots of living epiphytic
Nephrolepis biserrata
on
Elaeis guineensis , SLS
(MC pH 6.4). On bark of living tree
Tabebuia pallida , SLS
(MC pH 6.8). On dry stems of living climber liana
Thunbergia grandiflora , SLS
(MC pH 6.4). Loc. 6 Mahé : On dead leaves attached to a living succulent
Agave angustifolia , SLS
(MC pH 8.1), SLS (MC pH 7.2). On fallen leaves of climber liana

32326 (MC pH 7.1). On fallen leaves of
Cheilocostus speciosus , SLS
32410 (MC pH 7). Loc. 7 Mahé : On dead wood of
Spondias cytherea , AM
3102, TK2917. On fallen palm leaf, AM3111, TK2930. Loc. 8 Mahé : On dry grass
Dianella ensifolia , SLS
(MC pH). On dry stems of living liana

(MC pH 6.9), SLS (MC pH 6.7), SLS (MC pH 6.1). Loc. 10 Mahé : On stem surface of living palm

3123, TK2969. On fallen palm leaf of

3133, TK2984 (2FC). On dead wood of

3151, TK3020. On very rotten mossy wood AM3141, TK2996. Loc. 11 Praslin: On large leaves of

(MC pH 5.5). On dry pods attached to living
Leucaena leucocephala , SLS
(MC pH 6.2). On leaves of living climbing epiphytic orchid

(MC pH 5.6), SLS 32158 (MC pH 6.5). Loc. 12 Praslin: On bark of living tree

, SLS (MC pH 5.7), SLS 32222 (MC pH 5.4). Loc. 13 Praslin: On wood inside a rotten log of
